page.title: 10HOUSING SOUTH WOODHAM FERRER
page.content: { { {SOUTH WOODHAM FERRERS NEW TOWN. HOUSING IN THIS AREA IS MOSTLY DETACHED WITH SOME SEMI-DETACHED AND TERRACED. THERE IS ALSO A PROPORTION OF ONE BEDROOM FLATS/HOUSES FOR FIRST TIME BUYERS. WE DID A SURVEY IN COLLINGWOOD SCHOOL INVOLVING A SAMPLE OF 261 CHILDREN. 178 LIVED IN DETACHED HOUSES. 68 LIVED IN SEMI-DETACHED. 14 LIVED IN TERRACED. 1 LIVED IN A BUNGALOW. THIS AREA HAS MANY CUL-DE-SACS BECAUSE WITH THE NEW ESSEX DESIGN THE COUNCIL HAS ATTEMPTED TO BREAK AWAY FROM STRAIGHT LINE STREETS. 69 CHILDREN LIVED IN A "STRAIGHT LINE STREET". THE REST LIVED IN CUL-DE-SAC TYPE STREETS.
